channel.title: All right....I need help getting my computer to recognize Java
channel.description:
[center]I'm no noob when it comes to coding and all that crap so don't try and baby me into starting from the very VERY begining... All I need to know is how to get my computer to recognize java. Because when I go to compile my server I get that 'java' is not recognizable as an internale, external, or a batch file. I just need that fixed. Thankyou =)
EDIT : Ok so the real problem is... I can go in and edit things but I cannot edit my client.java or and .java for that matter.... I'm working on adding a shop for fish but I need to go into the client.java or whatever..... So yeah... Help pls?[/center]

item.title: All right....I need help getting my computer to recognize Java
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

There’s nothing much anyone can tell you, you are getting that error because your path variable is not set up correctly. Read the posts on this again and do it all again, just to make sure.

Read full topic
item.source: All right....I need help getting my computer to recognize Java

item.title: All right....I need help getting my computer to recognize Java
item.dc:creator: @The_Prodigyscape The Prodigyscape
item.description:
@The_Prodigyscape wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:2, topic:179047”]Setting up your compiler is pretty much the very beginning, so it looks like you do need to start there.

Tip: Use the search.[/quote]

Rofl mk…
But idk how much this is going to help since ive READ THREW IT ABOUT 8000 TIMES!!!

Read full topic
